aircraft.value: Pelican Cargo - AC-9017-960 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Hydraulic line vibration induced fatigue. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 25/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 26/06/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/06/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 29/06/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 30/06/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
